Attention Control and Cognition

I explore this aspect of attention control by studying how people differ on their ability to control attention and how that predicts other cognitive and perceptual abilities.
Published

August 25, 2022

Latest Updates

I am currently writing papers for publication on 1) attention control and inspection time tasks, and 2) sustained attention, reward, and pupil size.

I am currently brainstorming research ideas for the next data collection study.
